item.title: Blake Lively on the set of ‘IT ENDS WITH US’ film adaptation
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘THE MOTHER’ starring Jennifer Lopez was watched by 2.8M U.S. households over its debut weekend, beating ‘Glass Onion’ & ‘Murder Mystery 2.’
(Source: https://deadline.com/2023/05/the-mother-netflix-ratings-best-glass-onion-murder-mystery-2-samba-tv-report-1235367236/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: India Amarteifio behind the scenes of an Emmy Magazine photoshoot

item.title: Jonah Hauer-King and Halle Bailey at the UK premiere of #TheLittleMermaid
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Anchored by a powerful, starmaking performance from Halle Bailey and a charming, charismatic turn from Jonah Hauer-King, #TheLittleMermaid is hands-down the best live-action Disney adaptation, and a wonderful, enchanting movie in its own right.
Stay tuned for our full review.
item.author: FilmUpdates
